Item.Value: [Text:Hey, name's $Character_7$. I heard that you might be needing some extra hands to help withsome of the monsters around here. All I ask is that you build me a place to live. Doesn't need to be anything fancy. There is no way I'm moving back in with dad.][UnlockBuildingID:19]
[Text:Have I told you about the time I took down a $Monster_4$ in a single shot?][Default]
[Text:I've taken down thirty monsters this week. How about you?][Default]
[Text:A gift eh? You sure you don't just want something?]
[Text:You can't be serious. You're giving this to me? I've been looking for this! Thank you.]
[Text:Hello, what can I do for you?.{{Talk-Talk|Gift-GiveGift|%Friend-50%Join Party-Party|Never Mind-Cancel}}]
[Text:Certainly, I'd like to see what we can accomplish together.]
[Text:Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.]
[Text:What are you doing skulking about in the rain? Not up to now good are you?][Weather:Raining]
